data.contents:
Welcome to RollApp

This is a proof of concept web application. This application runs in modern browsers (sorry, IE).Â  This application is not ready for prime time, so expect bugs.

This application does not save data to any servers. It saves it to your browser's built in database on the computer that you're running on.

That means if you delete your browser data, the data from this application will disappear too. You can view the data by opening your browser's Developer Tools. In Chromium/Webkit based browsers, you can click on the Application Tab, IndexedDB to see the database.


Features and How To Use

To Create an Item

Click on one of the five icons in the top navigator. It will create a new blank entry.

There are five icons (in order), which represent each item type:

1. Note
2. Checklist
3. Value List
4. Solver
5. Timesheet


General Operations on Items

To edit an item's title, click on the Title, and you can edit it inline.

To lock an item (hides the delete button), click on the Lock icon.

To make the item a favorite, click on the Star icon.

To delete an item, click on the Trash Can.

If you hover over something and it turns gray, clicking on it will let you edit it inline.

To reorder a checklist, value list or solver, you can drag and drop a row.

For most items with input boxes, click on enter will add or save that item.


Notes

Notes are lightweight notes with limited formatting.

To edit a note, click on the preview text. Contents are auto-saved. To close the editor, click outside of the editor.


Checklists

To add an item, simply input the item into the input box and hit enter.

To mark an item as complete/incomplete, click on the checkbox.

To delete the item, click on the X icon.


Value Lists

A value list is a list with a label and a value. This is useful for tracking server names, URLs and other frequently copy-pasted items.

To add an item, add a label and value in the appropriate input boxes.

If a value is a link (starts with https:, http:, file:, mailto:, or tel:), then a button will appear that will open that link in a new tab/window.

You can copy the value to your clipboard by clicking on the copy icon.

You can toggle the visibility state of a value by clicking on the eye icon. While you can use this to store passwords, it is not recommended as is not secure , as the values are still stored in plain text in the browser's database. You should be using a password manager for that function instead.

To delete the item, click on the X icon.

Solvers
A solver is intended to be a 'smart calculator'. You can enter a math, unit or date expression into the expression input and if Rollapp understands it, it will provide an answer on the right side. Note that the solver uses floating point math, which can result in unusual decimal values.

Examples:

(1 + 1) / 2

5ft in inches

30 days from now

To copy the result of an expression, click on the copy icon

To delete the item, click on the X icon

Note that if you don't click enter on the expression item, it will not be saved to the list.

Future Features

Additional item types may be added in the future.

Export and import functionality will be provided.
